overview:
Dan McCormick is Senior Vice President of Products and Services, responsible for driving the overall strategic direction of Shutterflyâ€™s consumer facing businesses. Dan joined Shutterfly in 2005 and most recently served as Vice President of the Products Business and Vice President of Strategy.

Prior to joining Shutterfly, Dan was Director of Product Marketing for Network Appliance (NASDAQ: NTAP). With more than 15 years experience in strategic operations and finance, Dan held numerous senior management positions with Network Appliance including Director of Corporate Development, where he led the companyâ€™s mergers and acquisitions and strategic investment areas, as well as Director of Finance, with responsibilities for strategic finance and investor relations.

Prior to his tenure with Network Appliance, Dan served media, entertainment and retail clients as a Senior Analyst in the Strategy Group at Accenture (NYSE: ACN).

Dan earned his MBA from Harvard University and his BS degree from Babson College.

In his free time, Dan enjoys spending time outdoors playing Ben 10 with his two young sons, trying to find his lost jump shot and taking pictures with his Canon Digital Rebel.

relationships.title: Vice President & General Manager of Products and Services
